item.description:
The Polish National Home was suggested by one of our members who said she goes there for lunch and it is always quite good. The Hartford Courant calls it the best kept secret in Hartford - large portions of good polish food for small prices.

Parking is plentiful in their own lot. It is an older building that doesn't look like a restaurant, but is a "Hidden Gem" according to Metromix. I don't know anything more about it.

Sounds like good food at good prices to me, and of course we will all find good company at our table to share the good times with. I will collect $1.00 from attendees who wish to contribute toward the costs of running this meetup.

Hope to see you there! - Betsy

As always, if you RSVP "YES" - PLEASE SHOW UP!! Anyone who changes their RSVP to "NO" from "YES" less than 48 hours before the dinner will be considered a NO SHOW, and 3 no-show's will automatically terminate you from our group.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: POLISH NAT'L HOME 03/04/09 7:00pm
